mapper.select: select a.boardId, a.postNo, max(a.postTitle) postTitle, a.writer, a.modDate, a.readCnt, ifnull(count(distinct b.replyNo), 0) as replyCnt, ifnull(count(distinct c.likeNo), 0) as recommendCnt, ifnull(count(distinct d.fileSeq), 0) as attachFileCnt from post a left outer join reply b on (a.boardId = b.boardId and a.postNo = b.postNo and b.delYn = 'N') left outer join recommend c on (a.boardId = c.boardId and a.postNo = c.postNo and c.clCd = 'P') left outer join attachfile d on (a.boardId = d.boardId and a.postNo = d.postNo) where a.boardId = #{boardId} group by a.boardId, a.postNo, a.writer, a.modDate, a.readCnt order by postNo desc LIMIT #{pagination.startList}, #{pagination.listSize}
SELECT ifnull(count(*),0) from post where boardId = #{boardId}
SELECT ifnull(max(postNo),0) from post where boardId = #{boardId}

SELECT a.boardId, a.postNo, a.replyNo, max(a.repWriter) as repWriter, max(a.modDate) as modDate, max(a.repCont) as repCont, count(b.likeNo) as recommendCnt from reply a left outer join recommend b on (a.boardId = b.boardId and a.postNo = b.postNo and a.replyNo = b.replyNo) where a.boardId = #{boardId} and a.postNo = #{postNo} and a.delYn = 'N' group by a.boardId, a.postNo, a.replyNo order by a.replyNo desc
